verses.verse: <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> My <S%H5650>Servant,<s%> whom I <S%H8551>uphold;<s%> My <S%H972>chosen<s%> one [in whom] My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7521>delights.<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> My <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> upon Him; He will <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
"He will not <S%H6817>cry<s%> out or <S%H5375>raise<s%> [His <S%H6963>voice,<s%>] <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H8085>make<s%> His voice <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H2351>street.<s%>

"A <S%H7533>bruised<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> He will not <S%H7665>break,<s%> And a <S%H3544>dimly<s%> burning <S%H6594>wick<s%> He will not <S%H3518>extinguish;<s%> He will <S%H571>faithfully<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>

"He will not be <S%H3543>disheartened<s%> or <S%H7533>crushed,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> He has <S%H7760>established<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> And the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> will <S%H3176>wait<s%> <S%H3176>expectantly<s%> for His <S%H8451>law.<s%>"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Who <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and <S%H5186>stretched<s%> them out, Who <S%H7554>spread<s%> out the <S%H776>earth<s%> and its <S%H6631>offspring,<s%> Who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H5397>breath<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> on it, And <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to those who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in it,

"I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> you in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> I will also <S%H2388>hold<s%> you by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5341>watch<s%> over you, And I will <S%H5414>appoint<s%> you as a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> As a <S%H216>light<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%>

To <S%H6491>open<s%> <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> To <S%H3318>bring<s%> out <S%H616>prisoners<s%> from the <S%H4525>dungeon,<s%> And those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> from the <S%H1004>prison.<s%> <S%H3608><s%>

"I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that is My <S%H8034>name;<s%> I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> My <S%H9202>glory<s%> to <S%H312>another,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> My <S%H8416>praise<s%> to <S%H6456>graven<s%> <S%H6456>images.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223>things<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H935>pass,<s%> Now I <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H2319>things;<s%> <S%H2962>Before<s%> they <S%H6779>spring<s%> <S%H6779>forth<s%> I <S%H8085>proclaim<s%> [them] to you."

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> [Sing] His <S%H8416>praise<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth!<s%> You who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> that is in it. You <S%H339>islands<s%> and those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on them.

Let the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and its <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up [their voices,] The <S%H9161>settlements<s%> where <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> <S%H3427>inhabits.<s%> Let the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5553>Sela<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%> <S%H7442>aloud,<s%> Let them <S%H6681>shout<s%> for <S%H6681>joy<s%> from the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
Let them <S%H7760>give<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H5046>declare<s%> His <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H339>coastlands.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> like a <S%H1368>warrior,<s%> He will <S%H5782>arouse<s%> [His] <S%H7068>zeal<s%> like a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6873>war.<s%> He will <S%H7321>utter<s%> a <S%H7321>shout,<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> He will <S%H6873>raise<s%> a war <S%H6873>cry.<s%> He will <S%H1396>prevail<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> His <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

"I have <S%H2814>kept<s%> <S%H2814>silent<s%> for a <S%H5769>long<s%> <S%H5769>time,<s%> I have <S%H2790>kept<s%> <S%H2790>still<s%> and <S%H662>restrained<s%> Myself. [Now] like a woman in <S%H3205>labor<s%> I will <S%H6463>groan,<s%> I will <S%H3162>both<s%> <S%H5395>gasp<s%> and <S%H7602>pant.<s%>

"I will <S%H2717>lay<s%> <S%H2717>waste<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and <S%H1389>hills,<s%> And <S%H3001>wither<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6212>vegetation;<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> into <S%H339>coastlands,<s%> And <S%H3001>dry<s%> up the <S%H98>ponds.<s%>

"And I will <S%H1980>lead<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> by a <S%H1870>way<s%> they do not <S%H3045>know,<s%> In <S%H9350>paths<s%> they do not <S%H3045>know<s%> I will <S%H1869>guide<s%> them. I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H4285>darkness<s%> into <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them And <S%H4625>rugged<s%> <S%H4625>places<s%> into <S%H4334>plains.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1697>things<s%> I will <S%H6213>do,<s%> And I will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> them <S%H5800>undone.<s%>"

They shall be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> and be <S%H954>utterly<s%> <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame,<s%> Who <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H6459>idols,<s%> Who <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H4541>images,<s%> "You are our <S%H430>gods.<s%>"
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> you <S%H2795>deaf!<s%> And <S%H5027>look,<s%> you <S%H5787>blind,<s%> that you may <S%H7200>see.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H5787>blind<s%> but My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> Or so <S%H2795>deaf<s%> as My <S%H4397>messenger<s%> whom I <S%H7971>send<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> is so <S%H5787>blind<s%> as he that is at <S%H7999>peace<s%> [with Me,] Or so <S%H5787>blind<s%> as the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?
You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7227>things,<s%> but you do not <S%H8104>observe<s%> [them]; [Your] <S%H241>ears<s%> are <S%H6491>open,<s%> but <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H8085>hears.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2654>pleased<s%> for His righteousness' <S%H4616>sake<s%> To <S%H1431>make<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> and <S%H142>glorious.<s%>

But <S%H1931>this<s%> is a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H962>plundered<s%> and <S%H8154>despoiled;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> of them are <S%H6351>trapped<s%> in <S%H2352>caves,<s%> Or are <S%H2244>hidden<s%> away in <S%H3608>prisons;<s%> They have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H957>prey<s%> with <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> [them,] And a <S%H4933>spoil,<s%> with <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7725>"Give<s%> [them] <S%H7725>back!<s%>"
<S%H4310>Who<s%> among you will <S%H238>give<s%> <S%H238>ear<s%> to <S%H384>this<s%>? Who will <S%H7181>give<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H268>hereafter<s%>?

<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> up for <S%H4933>spoil,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H962>plunderers<s%>? Was it not the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> against <S%H2098>whom<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> And in whose <S%H1870>ways<s%> they were not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H1980>walk,<s%> And whose <S%H8451>law<s%> they did not <S%H8085>obey<s%>?

So He <S%H8210>poured<s%> out on him the <S%H2534>heat<s%> of His <S%H639>anger<s%> And the <S%H5807>fierceness<s%> of <S%H4421>battle;<s%> And it <S%H3857>set<s%> him <S%H3857>aflame<s%> <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> Yet he did not <S%H3045>recognize<s%> [it;] And it <S%H1197>burned<s%> him, but he <S%H7760>paid<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5921>attention.<s%> <S%H3820><s%>
